snippet.title: Fighting Vipers (XBLA) - Xbox 360 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Captured off the Xbox One. 

This port of SEGA's Arcade and Saturn game Fighting Vipers was released for the Xbox 360 via Xbox Live Arcade. This 360 release includes online multiplayer, achievements (200G) and save states. And of course, it's backward compatible on the Xbox One and Series X|S.

Fighting Vipers (C) SEGA
Also released for PlayStation 3 (PSN)
